body:
I am a researcher in linked open data. I believe a lot of frustration today is caused by data not being accessible (when does my train leave, how long do I have to queue, where does my money go, and so on). My goal is to increase your life quality by contextualizing data into information without you even noticing it.

You can find me here as well:
[Twitter](http://twitter.com/pietercolpaert), [Google+](https://plus.google.com/110114073598043885251/posts/p/pub), [Linkedin](http://be.linkedin.com/in/pcolpaert/), [google scholar](http://scholar.google.be/citations?user=fSlc4YAAAAAJ&hl=nl&oi=ao)

I live in in a small apartment in [one of the most wonderful cities](https://secure.flickr.com/photos/crafterm/40769811/lightbox/) in the world. If you are nearby Ghent, I am always up for a cup of coffee.

## Research

### Publications

 * Vander Sande, M., Colpaert, P., Van Deursen, D., Mannens, E., Van de Walle, R., [The DataTank: an Open Data adapter with semantic output](http://www2012.org/proceedings/nocompanion/DevTrack_014.pdf), 2012
 * Colpaert, P., Vander Sande, M., Mannens, E., Van de Walle, R., [Follow The Stars](http://archive.ugent.be/input/download?func=downloadFile&fileOId=1964760&recordOId=1964754), 2011

You can find my master's thesis on The DataTank over [here](http://pieter.demo.thedatatank.com/scriptie.pdf) (in Dutch)

### Affiliation
 * [UGent](http://ugent.be)
 * [iMinds](http://iminds.be)
 * [Multi Media Lab](http://multimedialab.elis.ugent.be)

## Current projects

### 
 * SoLoMIDEM
 * Apps For Europe
 * [iRail Summer of code](http://summerofcode.be)

### Software
 * [The DataTank](http://thedatatank.com), _the_ data publishing tool
 * R&Wbase, enabling the read/write linked open data web
 * A digital signage platform called [MyTurtle](https://github.com/FlatTurtle/MyTurtle) written in HTML5 to visualize open data on big screens

## Not for profit
I am
 * the chair man of the [Belgian chapter](http://okfn.be) of the [Open Knowledge Foundation](http://okfn.org) in 2013
 * active as a board member of [iRail](http://hello.iRail.be), a Belgian not for profit supporting digital creativity concerning mobility
 * a community coordinator at the [open transport working group](http://transport.okfn.org) at [OKFN](http://okfn.org).

## For profit

Together with [Yeri Tiete](http://tuinslak.be) and [RentalVALUE](http://www.RentalVALUE.be), I have started a company in real-time digital signage called [FlatTurtle](https://flatturtle.com). Follow us on our [blog](http://blog.flatturtle.com).
